Name: Zinedine Zidane
Details: Zinedine Zidane won the FIFA World Player of the Year in 2000 and 2003.

Name: Ronaldo
Details: Ronaldo won the FIFA World Player of the Year in 2002.

Name: Ronaldinho
Details: Ronaldinho won the FIFA World Player of the Year in 2004 and 2005.

Name: Kaka
Details: Kaka won the FIFA World Player of the Year in 2007.

Name: Lionel Messi
Details: Lionel Messi won the FIFA Ballon d'Or and FIFA World Player of the Year multiple times.

Name: Cristiano Ronaldo
Details: Cristiano Ronaldo won the FIFA Ballon d'Or and FIFA World Player of the Year multiple times.

Name: Luka Modrić
Details: Luka Modrić won the FIFA Best Men's Player in 2018.

Name: Robert Lewandowski
Details: Robert Lewandowski won the FIFA Best Men's Player in 2020 and 2021.
